001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007
008public interface GradientDescentOptimizer<N extends Number> extends LinearModelOptimizer<N>, IterativeOptimizer<N> {
009
010    static <N extends Number> Interceptor<N> nullInterceptor() {
011        return (epoch, model, trainSet, optimizer, gradients) -> gradients;
012    }
013
014    @FunctionalInterface
015    interface Interceptor<N extends Number> {
016
017        @SafeVarargs
018        static <N extends Number> Interceptor<N> of(Interceptor<N>... interceptor) {
019            return (epoch, model, trainSet, optimizer, gradients) -> {
020                Vector<N> currentGradients = Vectors.convert(gradients, model.getCurrentNumberType());
021                for (Interceptor<N> inter : interceptor) {
022                    Vector<N> newGradients = inter.interceptGradients(epoch, model, trainSet, optimizer, gradients);
023                    Vector<N> substract = newGradients.substract(gradients);
024                    currentGradients = currentGradients.add(substract);
025                }
026                return currentGradients;
027            };
028        }
029
030        Vector<N> interceptGradients(int epoch, LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model, DataSet<N> trainSet, GradientDescentOptimizer<N> optimizer, Vector<N> gradients);
031
032    }
033
034    void setInterceptor(Interceptor<N> interceptor);
035
036    default void setInterceptors(Interceptor<N>... interceptors) {
037        setInterceptor(Interceptor.of(interceptors));
038    }
039
040    Interceptor<N> getInterceptor();
041
042}
